text: The 2000–01 Nordic Football Championship was the 14th Nordic Football Championship. Six Nordic countries were in the tournament, Denmark, the Faroe Islands, Finland, Iceland, Norway and Sweden. Some of the tournament was played in Spain. == Results == Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Finland 5 4 0 1 7 3 +4 12 Iceland 5 3 1 1 7 5 +2 10 Denmark 5 2 0 3 7 8 –1 6 Norway 4 1 2 1 6 6 0 5 Sweden 5 1 2 2 3 4 –1 5 Faroe Islands 4 0 1 3 2 6 –4 1 31 January 2000 align=right align=right align=right 2 February 2000 align=right align=right 4 February 2000 align=right align=right align=right 16 August 2000 align=right align=right align=right 2 September 2000 align=right 31 January 2001 align=right 1 February 2001 align=right 2001 align=right Category:Nordic Football Championship Category:2000 in association football Category:2001 in association football Category:2000 in Denmark Category:Faroe Islands Category:2000s in Finland Category:21st century in Iceland Category:2000s in Norway Category:2000s in Swedish sport Category:2000 in Sweden
